sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import {Button, Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card} from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { getOrderDetails } from '../actions/orderActions'; import Loader from '../components/Loader'; import Message from '../components/Message'; function OrderScreen({history, match}) { const addDecimals = (num) => { return (Math.round(num * 100) / 100).toFixed(2); } const orderId = match.params.id; const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { order, loading, error } = useSelector(state => state.orderDetails); const itemsPrice = !loading ? addDecimals(order.orderItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0)) : 0; // USE EFFECT useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getOrderDetails(orderId)); }, [dispatch, orderId]) return loading ? : error ? {error} : ( <>

Order {order._id}

Shipping

Address: {order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.city}, {order.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {order.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod},

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? ( Your Order is Empty ): ( {order.orderItems.map((item, index)=> ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items ${itemsPrice} Shipping ${order.shippingPrice} Tax ${order.taxPrice} Total ${order.totalPrice} ) } export default OrderScreen
